statements: DELETE FROM SatelliteImageryData WHERE capture_date < '2022-01-01' AND resolution > 1.5
DELETE FROM ImageMetadata WHERE metadata_id = 100 AND image_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_id = 100 AND capture_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ImageMetadata WHERE metadata_id IN (SELECT metadata_id FROM ImageMetadata WHERE metadata_key = 'location' AND metadata_value = 'Paris');
DELETE FROM image_analysis_results WHERE image_id = 123 AND analyzed_date <= '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM satellite_metadata WHERE metadata_id IN (SELECT metadata_id FROM satellite_metadata WHERE capture_location = 'New York') AND capture_date < '2022-08-15';
